channel.title: Ipfilter on Sad Robot
channel.description: Recent content in Ipfilter on Sad Robot

item.title: IPFilter Updater… Updated!
item.description: I’ve made some minor changes to the IPFilter Updater. The list mirror it was using was out of date, so I’ve found a new list provider (I-Blocklist) and obtained their permission to point at that list. The project has also now been re-hosted on Codeplex. New home: https://ipfilter.codeplex.com/

item.title: IPFilter Updated to 1.0.0.1
